item.title: Social Media Strategy, Marketing and Content Posting for Personal Trainer - Upwork
item.description:
I have a personal training business, Max Lean Fit. I'm mostly on social media on facebook, instagram, and just starting youtube. The website I've spent a little bit to build in elementor/wordpress. I need someone virtual who can work on a strategy and make content for the next 3 months on the platforms I'm on. I need video editing and content creation, make my website rank locally within a year.
I'm willing to hire multiple specialists, for example if we need video creation or SEO experts ok, I'm trying to make the most effective strategy to get clients almost immediately, within months.
Please demonstrate that you are skilled in crafting content strategies that get clients, understand hashtags, the kinds of content that gets engagement, trends, etc. I would like to minimize the stress of all this and just finally make it all click, the biggest goal is to get paying clients for my flagship program.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:07 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Content Creation, Content Marketing Strategy, SEO Keyword Research, YouTube, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Content Strategy, Instagram, Facebook

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented YouTube video editor to join our team. As a YouTube video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our videos to create engaging content for our audience. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of YouTube trends and should be able to implement them into the editing process.
    Responsibilities:
    - Edit raw footage and assemble it into a compelling story
    - Enhance video and audio quality
    - Add engaging transitions, titles, and effects
    - Collaborate with the content team to ensure videos align with the brand's message
    - Stay up-to-date with the latest YouTube trends and best practices
    Skills:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Knowledge of YouTube video optimization techniques
    - Strong creative and storytelling skills
    - Ability to work under tight deadlines
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
    Size: Medium
    Duration: 1 to 3 months
    Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $5

item.title: UGC Content Creator For Skin Care Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic and fast-growing skincare brand in need of a talented content creator who specializes in User Generated Content (UGC). We already have someone who handles picture creatives for our Instagram page, but we urgently need a skilled professional to produce high-quality videos, commercials, and video ad content for our marketing campaigns.

**Responsibilities:**

- Create engaging and authentic video content that resonates with our target audience.
- Develop video ads for various platforms including social media, YouTube, and other advertising channels.
- Produce compelling commercials to promote our skincare products.
- Collaborate with our marketing team to align content with our brand’s voice and objectives.
- Edit and optimize videos for different platforms and ad requirements.
- Stay updated with the latest trends in skincare and video content creation to ensure our brand remains relevant and appealing.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in creating UGC and video content, preferably for skincare or beauty brands.
- Strong video editing skills and proficiency with editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
- Ability to produce high-quality videos that drive engagement and conversions.
- Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
- Portfolio or samples of previous video content work.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience in creating video ads for social media and digital marketing campaigns.
- Understanding of skincare products and the beauty industry.
- Familiarity with social media trends and best practices for video content.

**Why Join Us:**

- Opportunity to work with a vibrant and innovative skincare brand.
- Creative freedom to produce impactful and engaging content.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
- Competitive compensation based on experience and quality of work.

**How to Apply:**

If you are passionate about skincare and have the skills to create captivating video content, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you’d be a great fit for our team.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Branding
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Branding
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
I'm Sheffield Made Plants - a YouTube channel with a mission to help people look after their indoor plants better.

I'm looking for a skilled video editor with a deep understanding of YouTube and the algorithm to take my videos to the next level. I will need 1 video per week.

Requirements:
To match and improve my current video and sound design.

Trimming raw video footage and editing out mistakes while keeping proper pacing of the story.

Editing raw audio to get a high sound quality.

Adding in sound effects where needed while not overtaking my voice.

Adding in music where needed that matches the feel of the story.

Good colour grading is essential.

Suitable transitions for the target viewer.

Add captions on key moments.

To apply please send a 1 minute sample using the video files at https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1LrD-SeVQ1_aCOL94ZqjL9EQlfaLDvIyF?usp=sharing



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Ad Expert for Social Media Campaigns - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video ad expert who can create and optimize video campaigns for Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing existing videos and producing engaging content that drives positive results. As a video ad expert, you will be responsible for developing compelling ad concepts, creating eye-catching visuals, and implementing effective targeting strategies.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong knowledge of social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok)
  - Ability to analyze campaign data and make data-driven optimizations
  - Creative thinking and storytelling abilities
  - Understanding of current video ad trends and best practices

  This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level video ad expert who can deliver high-quality campaigns that resonate with our target audience. If you have a track record of driving successful video campaigns and can showcase your previous work, we'd love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:46 UTC
Category: Campaign Management
Skills:Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Instagram
Skills: Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Instagram
Country: United States

item.title: Tiktok live influencer team - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a team of tiktok influencers, preferabbly women to promote products that I will send to them and you will recieve a commission of the sales you make with that product. I do want to add a base pay as well but I will only add the base pay once I see that you can bring in lots of sales through commission first. I prefer to hire women for this project, and I prefer you have a high tiktok following and can show me that you have done viral videos in the past. I would like you to make a video with the product as well as do tiktok livestreams with the product for a couple hours per day. Thanks, let me know if you're interested.

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I need a skilled and experienced video editor who can create an Instagram Reel that matches the quality and style of this example: https://www.instagram.com/p/C5rTA7fJ9up/?hl=de  

Requirements:

• Experience in Creating Instagram Reels: You should have experience in creating multiple Instagram Reels and be familiar with current trends and requirements.
• High-Quality Editing: The videos must be professionally edited, with high visual and audio quality.
• Creative Design: You should be able to create engaging and captivating content that resonates with the audience.
• Knowledge of Video Editing Software: Experience with software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools is required.
• Punctuality and Reliability: The project must be completed within an agreed timeframe.

Tasks:

• Create an Instagram Reel of approximately 30-60 seconds in length.
• Adapt the video to match the specifications and style of the provided example.
• Incorporate music, transitions, and other effects that align with the example.
• Make adjustments and fine-tune the video based on feedback.

Application Process:

Please submit your application with the following information:

1. A brief cover letter outlining your experience and skills.
2. Examples of your previous work, preferably Instagram Reels or similar projects.
3. Your proposed budget and the estimated time required to complete this project.

Project Timeline:

The project should be completed within 1-2 weeks after the assignment.

I look forward to your application and to creating an impressive Instagram Reel together!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Photoshop Pro To Quickly Crop/Remove Background From Images - Upwork
item.description:
I have a total of 6 images that each contain a grid of items/designs (total of 72 items). I need someone who can come in and quickly crop out each item in the grid, remove the white background, and save it as its own png file, within a folder that corresponds to the image you're working on. Something like:

Desserts
- dessert-1
- dessert-2
-...etc

Each image will either be cropped from the main image as 192x192px or 128x192px or 192x128px (I'll specify which are used for which image).

item.title: Video Content Producer, Editor, & Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We need someone located in NY for this role.

We are launching an exciting new entrepreneur YouTube interview show and are looking for a talented videographer and content strategist to join our team. This role is perfect for someone who is young, hungry, and eager to make a mark in the world of digital content.

These will be in-person interviews that we are filming so we need someone who is willing to travel to the locations with our team. We are looking for someone in the Westchester, NY area to start since that is where we are located and most of the guests will be.

As the show grows, we'll travel to other states to film episodes.

Responsibilities:
Film high-quality in-person interviews with host and guests
Edit raw footage into engaging episodes
Develop creative storytelling techniques to enhance each episode
Collaborate on episode strategies and content planning
Manage the entire production process from pre-production to post-production
Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate new ideas into the show

Requirements:
Proven experience in videography and video editing
Strong storytelling and creative skills
Ability to strategize and plan content effectively
Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Highly motivated and able to work independently
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with social media content creation
Familiarity with YouTube and podcasting platforms
A portfolio showcasing previous work
Passion for content creation is just as important to us as experience.

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Cinematography, Video Production, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing, Creative Direction
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Cinematography, Video Production, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing, Creative Direction
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphic Designer Needed for Building Animation Project - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a talented motion graphic designer to create an engaging animation for a building project. The animation will feature a building with overlaying pipe systems, displayed in both green and white, starting from the center and moving outward. The final frame should show the building with the green overlay only.

Project Details:

Building Image: We will provide a high-quality PNG image of the building.
Overlay Images: We have separate images for the green and white overlays of the internal systems.
Animation Requirements:
Start the animation from the center of the building.
Draw each pipe and line separately, interweaving green and white overlays.
Transition to showing only the green overlay at the end of the animation.
Output: The final video should be in high definition, suitable for presentations and online sharing.
Attachments:

Building Image (PNG)
Green Overlay Image (PNG)
White Overlay Image (PNG)
Combined Overlay Image (PNG)
Example Video
Skills Required:

Proficiency in Adobe After Effects or similar motion graphics software.
Experience in creating technical or architectural animations.
Strong attention to detail and creativity.
Deliverables:

An HD video file of the final animation.
Source files of the project for future edits (e.g., After Effects project file). As well as a Web Compatible format such a 1920x10-80 MP4 in .h264


How to Apply:

Provide a brief introduction of yourself and your experience with similar projects.
Include a link to your portfolio showcasing relevant work.
Describe how you would approach this project.
We look forward to working with a skilled designer who can bring this vision to life!

Hourly Range: $17.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:30 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Animated Cartoon, Concept Video, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Animation
Skills: MP4, Animated Cartoon, Concept Video, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Creating Viral Content and Video Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor who is skilled in creating viral style organic content as well as video ads for platforms like Linkedin and Instagram. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage, adding special effects, transitions, and graphics to create engaging videos that capture the attention of our target audience. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their ability to create impactful and shareable content.

    Required Skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, or equivelant)
    - Strong understanding of video storytelling and visual composition
    - Knowledge of video formatting and optimization for various social media platforms
    - Ability to work with tight deadlines and adapt to client requirements

    Size: Medium
    Duration: 1 to 3 months
    Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: Canada

item.title: Quiz Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
For a new YouTube channel, I am looking for a professional Quiz video editor who can make better videos than this channel: https://www.youtube.com/@CerebroLudico/videos

It will mainly be videos like 'find the odd one out'. I want to start the channel in Spanish.

Let me know what you can offer and what your price is.
- Script
- Video editing
- Thumbnail
- Voice

Most of these videos on YouTube are around 9 minutes. I want a longer view duration, so I would like to have videos around 20 minutes.

The price is negotiable.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
